page.title: 16RECREATION BISHOPBRIGGS
page.content:
Bishopbriggs has a wide variety of sports facilities both indoors and outdoors. There are 3 {Golf Courses}in the area, a{Tennis Club}a newly opened {Snooker Club,}a Sports Centre(p 17), 2 major outdoor facilities:- {Allan Glen's}sports club where Rugby, Cricket, Shinty, and Archery are available. {Huntershill Outdoor Recreation Centre} run by Strathkelvin District Council offering facilities for Soccer, Rugby, Cricket, and Athletics
There are many casual open spaces within the area which offer 'kick-about' opportunities as well as a number of children's playgrounds.
